name: LES Coleman Skatepark
address: Monroe St & Pike St, New York, NY 10002
notes: One of NYC's most iconic street-style skateparks. Opened 2012, designed by California Skateparks.

name: Chelsea Piers Skatepark
address: Pier 62, Hudson River Park, New York, NY 10011
notes: Waterfront skatepark at Pier 62 in Hudson River Park. Great views of the Hudson.

name: Riverside Skatepark (108th St)
address: Riverside Dr & W 108th St, New York, NY 10025
notes: Located in Riverside Park. Popular Upper West Side spot with a nice flow bowl.

name: Central Park Skate Circle
address: Central Park, W 72nd St, New York, NY 10023
notes: Informal skate spot near the Bandshell. Mostly flat ground skating and dancing.

name: Brooklyn Banks (under renovation)
address: Park Row, New York, NY 10038
notes: Legendary NYC skate spot under the Brooklyn Bridge. Historic significance to East Coast skating.

name: McCarren Skatepark
address: McCarren Park, N 12th St & Berry St, Brooklyn, NY 11249
notes: Popular Williamsburg park with a great mix of street and transition elements.

name: Owl's Head Skatepark
address: Owl's Head Park, 68th St & Colonial Rd, Brooklyn, NY 11220
notes: Bay Ridge's beloved skatepark with great transition skating. Beautiful park setting.

name: Prospect Park Skatepark (Lakeside)
address: 171 E Dr, Brooklyn, NY 11225
notes: Located near the Lakeside complex in Prospect Park.

name: Williamsburg Skatepark (Broadway)
address: 533 Broadway, Brooklyn, NY 11206
notes: Neighborhood street-style park in south Williamsburg.

name: Bed-Stuy Skatepark (Tompkins Ave)
address: Tompkins Ave & Greene Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11216
notes: Community skatepark in Bedford-Stuyvesant.

name: Astoria Skatepark
address: Astoria Park, Shore Blvd & Ditmars Blvd, Queens, NY 11105
notes: Under the Triborough Bridge with stunning views. One of Queens' best parks.

name: Rockaway Beach Skatepark
address: Shore Front Pkwy & Beach 91st St, Queens, NY 11693
notes: Beachside skatepark in the Rockaways. Surf and skate in the same day!

name: Flushing Meadows Skatepark
address: Flushing Meadows Corona Park, Queens, NY 11368
notes: Located in the iconic Flushing Meadows Corona Park near the Unisphere.

name: Maloof Skatepark (Far Rockaway)
address: Beach 46th St & Rockaway Beach Blvd, Queens, NY 11691
notes: Built by the Maloof Money Cup. World-class competition-grade park.

name: Forest Park Skatepark
address: Forest Park, Woodhaven Blvd, Queens, NY 11421
notes: Smaller neighborhood park in Forest Park.

name: Monsignor McGolrick Park Skatepark
address: Nassau Ave & Monitor St, Brooklyn, NY 11222
notes: Small but fun street-style park in Greenpoint.

name: Stapleton Skatepark
address: Tompkinsville Park, Bay St, Staten Island, NY 10301
notes: Staten Island's main skatepark near the ferry terminal.

name: Faber Park Skatepark
address: Faber Park, Richmond Terrace, Staten Island, NY 10301
notes: Community skatepark on Staten Island's North Shore.

name: Bronx Skatepark (Mullaly Park)
address: Mullaly Park, E 164th St & Jerome Ave, Bronx, NY 10452
notes: The Bronx's premier skatepark near Yankee Stadium. Great bowl section.

name: Hunts Point Skatepark
address: Hunts Point Riverside Park, Lafayette Ave, Bronx, NY 10474
notes: Waterfront skatepark in Hunts Point with Bronx River views.

name: River Avenue Skatepark
address: River Ave & E 158th St, Bronx, NY 10451
notes: Small street-style spot in the South Bronx.

name: KCDC Skatepark (indoor)
address: 85 N 3rd St, Brooklyn, NY 11249
notes: Indoor skatepark and skate shop in Williamsburg. Session fees apply.

name: Pier 25 Skatepark
address: Pier 25, Hudson River Park, N Moore St, New York, NY 10013
notes: TriBeCa waterfront skatepark. Part of the Hudson River Park system.

name: St. Mary's Park Skatepark
address: St. Mary's Park, St. Ann's Ave & E 145th St, Bronx, NY 10455
notes: South Bronx community skatepark in historic St. Mary's Park.

name: Cooper Park Skatepark
address: Cooper Park, Olive St & Maspeth Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11211
notes: Neighborhood park in East Williamsburg/Bushwick border.

name: Coney Island Skatepark
address: Kaiser Park, Neptune Ave & Bayview Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11224
notes: Near Coney Island boardwalk. Combine a beach day with skating.

name: Harold Ickes Playground Skatepark
address: W 23rd St & FDR Dr, New York, NY 10010
notes: Small street spot near Stuyvesant Town.

name: Highbridge Skatepark
address: Highbridge Park, Edgecombe Ave & W 173rd St, New York, NY 10032
notes: Washington Heights skatepark in Highbridge Park.
